metadata.description: Utility for generating structured JSON for codebases
instructions: Follow best practices, warn if instructions conflict with them
Use attached struct.json for context and navigation
Request missing modules or functions if needed
Regenerate JSON for significant changes, track via Git and artifacts
Use internal comments for descriptions, append brief summary

goals: Create universal JSON format for codebase structure (modules, functions, classes, calls, metadata)
Ensure extensibility for new languages and entity types
Develop modular, plugin-based parsers for new languages
Maintain an open, RFC-style documented format
Integrate with LLMs by generating and attaching JSON structure to queries

modules.module_doc:
LLMStruct Copilot Integration Module
Provides context-aware development assistance with hybrid copilot capabilities.

functions.name: initialize_copilot
functions.docstring:
Initialize copilot context manager for the project.

Args:
    project_root: Project root directory

Returns:
    Configured CopilotContextManager instance

functions.name: trigger_copilot_event
functions.docstring:
Trigger a copilot event and get relevant context.

Args:
    manager: CopilotContextManager instance
    event_type: Type of event
    file_path: Optional file path
    **kwargs: Additional event metadata

Returns:
    Dict with event context

functions.name: smart_suggest
functions.docstring:
Get smart suggestions based on query and context.

Args:
    manager: CopilotContextManager instance
    query: Query string
    context: Context type (code, workflow, task, etc.)

Returns:
    List of suggestions

functions.name: __init__
functions.docstring:
Initialize the Copilot Context Manager.

Args:
    project_root: Project root directory
    config_path: Path to copilot_init.json

functions.name: _load_config
functions.docstring: Load copilot configuration from JSON file.

functions.name: load_context_layer
functions.docstring:
Load a specific context layer.

Args:
    layer_name: Name of the layer to load
    force: Force reload if already loaded

Returns:
    bool: True if successful

functions.name: unload_context_layer
functions.docstring:
Unload a context layer to free memory.

Args:
    layer_name: Name of the layer to unload

Returns:
    bool: True if successful

functions.name: get_context_for_event
functions.docstring:
Get relevant context for a copilot event.

Args:
    event: The copilot event

Returns:
    Dict containing relevant context

functions.name: suggest_completion
functions.docstring:
Generate context-aware code completions.

Args:
    current_code: Current code content
    file_path: Path to the current file
    cursor_position: Cursor position in the code

Returns:
    List of completion suggestions

functions.name: validate_change
functions.docstring:
Validate a code change against safety rules.

Args:
    file_path: Path to the changed file
    change_type: Type of change (create, edit, delete)

Returns:
    Dict with validation results

functions.name: _matches_scope
functions.docstring: Check if file matches scope pattern.

functions.name: _matches_trigger
functions.docstring: Check if change type matches trigger.

functions.name: get_workflow_suggestions
functions.docstring:
Get workflow suggestions based on current command context.

Args:
    command: Current command or operation

Returns:
    List of workflow suggestions

functions.name: refresh_all_contexts
functions.docstring:
Refresh all loaded context layers.

Returns:
    bool: True if successful

functions.name: get_context_status
functions.docstring:
Get status of all context layers.

Returns:
    Dict with context status information

functions.name: export_context
functions.docstring:
Export context in specified format.

Args:
    layers: List of layers to export (None for all loaded)
    format: Export format (json, yaml, etc.)

Returns:
    Exported context as string

classes.docstring: Context layer priorities for copilot integration.

classes.docstring: Represents a copilot event for context triggering.

classes.docstring:
Manages context layers and integration with GitHub Copilot.
Provides intelligent context loading and workflow assistance.

modules.module_doc:
Automatic struct.json update script
This script automatically parses the project and updates struct.json
without requiring LLM intervention.

functions.name: detect_project_changes
functions.docstring:
Detect if project files have changed since last struct.json generation.
Uses git status to check for modifications.

functions.name: backup_struct_json
functions.docstring: Create a backup of existing struct.json.

functions.name: validate_struct_json
functions.docstring: Validate generated struct.json for basic structure.

functions.name: update_struct_json
functions.docstring:
Main function to update struct.json automatically.

Args:
    root_dir: Project root directory (default: current directory)
    struct_path: Path to struct.json (default: ./struct.json)
    force: Force regeneration even if no changes detected
    config_override: Override default configuration

Returns:
    bool: True if update was successful
